properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
SIERRA LEONE.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED BY PIRATES IN 08-27.3N 013-26.4W
   AT 300345Z JAN. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR
   OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
   E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG, PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 07 FEB 17.
